title: Bug 116829: Label height not changing with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately. Instead, the height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height remains the same.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Check that the label height adjusts to reflect the new font size.
